title: Web Developer
text: As a front-end developer, I designed and built user-centric applications using React, TypeScript, and MobX, contributing to various projects including a STEAM course platform and a company management system, which improved administrative efficiency by 40%.

title: Full-Stack Developer
text: As a full-stack developer, I've contributed to multiple teams, delivering single-page applications for sectors like real estate using React and Node.js, enhancing company website traffic, developing an automated SMS system, creating a customer management CRM system.

title: Full-Stack Developer
text: As a full-stack developer, I've constructed and integrated front-end pages for multiple blockchain web applications using modern tech stacks, developed over a dozen smart contracts on various blockchain networks, spearheaded NFT and Defi projects, and crafted reusable React and Vue components, leading to a 30% reduction in development effort.
